entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
